content: I noticed that in rustc_resolve/src/late.rs, rust-analyzer thinks there are 2 incomplete match statements, but they compile fine. Does rust-analyzer use a different algorithm than the one in "compiler/rustc_mir_build/src/thir/pattern/_match.rs"? should I report this on the rust analyzer repo?
Oh wait this is probably because #![feature(or_patterns)] is on. how can I make rust-analyzer respect features?
Yes, the or-patterns implementation in rust-analyzer is incomplete
